name: the-global-object
description: Returns the global object in Node or in the browser, including the web worker.

scripts.lint: eslint *.js && echo LINTING OK || (echo LINTING ERROR; false)
scripts.modules: npm ls 2>&1 && echo NPMLS OK || echo NPMLS ERROR
scripts.versions: echo SHELL /bin/sh: && /bin/sh --version && echo SHELL /bin/bash: && /bin/bash --version && echo NODE: && node -v && echo NPM: && npm -v && node -e 'console.log(process.versions);' && echo VERSIONS OK || echo VERSIONS ERROR
scripts.sysinfo: uname -a && cat /proc/meminfo && df -h . && echo SYSINFO OK || echo SYSINFO ERROR
scripts.spec: tap tests/**/*.js && echo SPEC TESTS OK || (echo SPEC TESTS ERROR; false)
scripts.test: npm run versions && npm run lint && npm run spec && echo NPM TEST OK || (echo NPM TEST ERROR; false)

author: Rafa≈Ç Pocztarski <r.pocztarski@gmail.com> (http://pocztarski.com/)
